Title: I will setup schema markups for rich snippets on wordpress website
Description:
I will set up rich snippet schema markup into your WordPress website
We integrate rich snippet markup code into your website the necessary and required so that your pages appear in search engine result more attractive and more information gets passed to search engines so that you can be ranked more accurately.
The reason of structuring website data is to communicate better with search engines. When Google understands entities on a deeper level, it serves better results to searchers.
We implement and Google supports the relevant and necessary rich snippet markup including the following.
Star aggregate rating schema
Review schema
Local Business
FAQ schema
Services schema
Site navigation 
Breadcrumb list schema
Contact Page
About us
Blog Postings
Logo markup
Product
Organization
Video schema
All of these are reflected in your listings in the search results and allows your web site's pages to appear in more specific search engines.
Leave a message before placing an order

Title: I will do wordpress website speed optimization, improve page speed
Description:
Why Choose My WordPress Speed Optimization Service?
Increase search engine rankings:
 Google and other search engines factor page speed into their ranking algorithms. By making your site faster, you'll be more likely to appear at the top of search results and attract more organic traffic.
Improve User Experience and Boost conversions:
 A faster site means a better user experience, which can translate into more sales, sign-ups, or whatever your goal is.
Proven results: 
A track record of successfully optimizing 1400+ WordPress sites for speed. We've helped our clients see significant improvements in page loading times and other performance metrics.
What's included in My WordPress Website Speed Optimize Service?
I use the latest techniques, such as manual 
image optimization, code optimization (JS and CSS), preloading above-the-fold assets, CDN (Content Delivery Network)
, etc. to ensure your site runs at optimal speed. I'll analyze your website and identify areas for improvement, then implement the necessary changes to increase your website's performance.
Don't let a slow website hold you back. Contact and see the difference a fast site can make for your business.
